conversation.event: <0>speech</0> <1>It's really a pity that we're not allowed inside.</1> <2>matoran</2> <3></3> <4></4>
<0>speech</0> <1>Well, the thinkers inside don't like to be disturbed.</1> <2>matoran</2> <3></3> <4></4>
<0>speech</0> <1>So we must be content to look.</1> <2>matoran</2> <3></3> <4></4>
